content: MFT-C Cassette mounting Clip and bolt for mounting cassette (liner tray) systems on substructure profiles ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Accessories for façade systems- ### FEATURES:Features Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Rubberized facade bolt MFT-C BO 74x10 R, black to help avoid noise emission Applications Clip and bolt to mount cassette systems to the substructure profile Fastening clip to secure the aluminum bolt in position ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: EN AW-6063 T66, Alu: EN AW-6082-T6 Technical Data | Material composition | EN AW-6063 T66, Alu: EN AW-6082-T6 ### ITEMS- 2074145 - Facade bolt MFT-C BO 74x10 R black - Package Size 150 pc - 2030615 - Clip MFT-C 22,5x23,8x40 - Package Size 150 pc
